title: Holly Madison and lookalike daughter Rainbow are beaming
text:
Holly Madison and her three-year-old daughter Rainbow shared a sweet moment on Thursday as they posed for a photo with Princess Elsa and Princess Anna from Frozen at an unidentified Disney park.

The former Playboy model was disguised as Dolores from Westworld as her daughter was decked out in a Rapunzel costume.

Her two-year-old son, Forrest, went for a classic Spiderman getup and he seemed to get into character while posing for the photo.

Adorable: Holly Madison and her three-year-old daughter Rainbow shared a sweet moment on Thursday as they posed for a photo with Princess Elsa and Princess Anna from Frozen at an unidentified Disney park

'One of us is a robot,' Madison joked in the caption, leading to some confusion for commenters trying to identify a robot in the group.

The photo comes as TMZ reports that Madison and fellow former ex-girlfriend of Hugh Hefner, Bridget Marquardt, are hosting a seance to conjure up communication with the Playboy head honcho himself - who died at 2017 at the age of 91.

Madison's house is the location of choice for the seance and it just happens to be haunted.

Paranormal activity: The photo comes as TMZ reports that Madison (R) and fellow former ex-girlfriend of Hugh Hefner, Bridget Marquardt, are hosting a seance to conjure up communication with the Playboy head honcho himself - who died at 2017 at the age of 91

And Ghost Adventures star and Hollywood psychic medium Patti Negri will be helping them out.

According to a source via the outlet, Marquardt is determined to speak with Hefner.

On the other hand, Madison is satisfied with speaking to any spirit that may come up.

Throwback: Hefner dated Madison, Marquardt and Kendra Wilkinson years ago and their antics were chronicled on E!'s The Girls Next Door

This is likely because Madison accused Hefner of verbally and emotionally abusing her when she lived in the Playboy Mansion.

Marquardt hosts a podcast titled GHOST MAGNET With Bridget Marquardt on Apple Podcasts, and the seance will be a special edition of her show.

Fans can also stream the ritual live on Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.

Hefner dated Madison, Marquardt and Kendra Wilkinson years ago and their antics were chronicled on E!'s The Girls Next Door.
